casebody.data:
JONES v HARMON et Ohio Supreme Court No 22155. Decided May 14, 1930

*322Marshall, CJ., Kinkade, Robinson and Matthias, JJ., concur. Jones and Day, JJ., concur in the syllabus but not in the judgment, since they do not agree with the law pronounced in Heidle v. Baldwin, 118 Ohio St., 375.
